title: The "Combined Experience" Math
reality: 4 founders x 25 years each? LinkedIn reveals: 35 years total. In AI specifically: 4.
example: Apparently time moves differently in startup land.

title: The "Senior Bank Executive"
reality: FINRA shows no registration. LinkedIn reveals "Technology Project Manager" overseeing CRM upgrades.
example: By this logic, the night janitor at Goldman Sachs also "worked with billions."

title: The Revolutionary Terminology
claim: Financial AGI with Cognitive Knowledge Orchestration (TM)
reality: Google Scholar results: 0. Academic papers: 0. Peer reviews: 0.
example: Invented terminology that sounds impressive precisely because no one can evaluate it.

title: The Impressive Case Study
claim: A leading biotech consortium reduced timelines by 73%
reality: "Which consortium?" -> "Confidential." "Can we speak to them?" -> "They prefer not to be contacted."
example: The only thing verifiable is that someone typed "73%."

title: The AI-Generated Business Plan
claim: Operationalizing cross-functional synergies through AI-native methodologies
reality: This sentence could describe any software. Or a toaster. Or nothing at all.
example: Pro tip: If you can replace "AI" with "blockchain" and it still works, it says nothing.

title: The Exclusive Demo
claim: Sign this NDA, provide sample data, then we'll schedule a preliminary discussion
reality: Translation: "Limit demos" = no working demo. "NDA required" = legal cover for nothing.
example: Real platforms: "Here's a sandbox, try it yourself."
